## Spanish production

```{r}
spa = data %>%
  filter(Language=="spa")
head(spa)

```

```{r}
spa_formula = "stress ~ dur_period*pc1*syllable + dur_period*pc2*syllable + f0*pc1*syllable + f0*pc2*syllable + vowel_periph*pc1*syllable + vowel_periph*pc2*syllable + (dur_period * syllable + f0 * syllable + vowel_periph * syllable|partID)"

spa_priors <- get_prior(spa_formula,spa,family=bernoulli())

spa_model <- brm(formula=bf(spa_formula,autocor = ~ 0),data=spa, family=bernoulli(), 
            prior=spa_priors, cores = 8, save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE), iter=4000)
```

Examine results

```{r}
summary(spa_model)
bayes_R2(spa_model)
```

Visualize results

```{r}
spa_posterior <- as.array(spa_model)  # prepare to plot the brm result
dim(spa_posterior)
dimnames(spa_posterior)$variable[1:30]
```

```{r}
spa_coeff_plot = mcmc_areas(spa_posterior, pars = c("b_dur_period", "b_pc1", "b_syllableult", "b_pc2", "b_f0",  "b_vowel_periph", "b_dur_period:pc1",  "b_dur_period:syllableult", "b_pc1:syllableult", "b_dur_period:pc2", "b_syllableult:pc2", "b_pc1:f0", "b_syllableult:f0", "b_pc2:f0", "b_pc1:vowel_periph", "b_syllableult:vowel_periph", "b_pc2:vowel_periph", "b_dur_period:pc1:syllableult", "b_dur_period:syllableult:pc2", "b_pc1:syllableult:f0", "b_syllableult:pc2:f0", "b_pc1:syllableult:vowel_periph", "b_syllableult:pc2:vowel_periph"), 
          prob = 0.8, # 80% intervals
          prob_outer = 0.95, # 95%
          point_est = "median") +
  scale_y_discrete(labels=c("Ultimate syllable:PC2:Vowel peripherality", "PC1:Ultimate syllable: Vowel peripherality", "Ultimate syllable:PC2:F0", "PC1:Ultimate syllable:F0", "Duration (periodic):Ultimate syllable:PC2", "Duration (periodic):PC1:Ultimate syllable", "PC2:Vowel peripherality", "Ultimate syllable:Vowel peripherality", "PC1:Vowel peripherality", "PC2:F0", "Ultimate syllable:F0", "PC1:F0", "Ultimate syllable:PC2", "Duration (periodic):PC2", "PC1:Ultimate syllable","Duration (periodic):Ultimate syllable", "Duration (periodic):PC1", "Vowel peripherality", "F0","PC2","Ultimate syllable", "PC1", "Duration (periodic)"), limits = rev) +
  labs(title = "Coefficients of Spanish production", x ="Coefficient, sd(Stress)") +theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust = 0.5))
spa_coeff_plot
```

```{r}
cairo_pdf("figures/spa_coeff.pdf", family = "serif", width = 8, height = 6)
spa_coeff_plot
dev.off()
```

```{r}
conditions = data.frame(pc1 = c(-5.51169, -0.6124431, 4.286804))
spa_dur_pc1_syllable = conditional_effects(spa_model, effects = "dur_period:syllable", conditions = conditions)
```

```{r}
spa_dur_pc1_syllable_plot = plot(spa_dur_pc1_syllable, plot = FALSE)[[1]] + labs(title = "Spanish production", x = "Duration (periodic)", y = "Proportion stressed") +
  guides(color=guide_legend(title="Syllable"), fill = 'none') +
  scale_color_discrete(labels=c('Penultimate', 'Ultimate')) +
  theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust = 0.5), legend.position = "bottom")

spa_dur_pc1_syllable_plot$data$cond__ <- ifelse(spa_dur_pc1_syllable_plot$data$cond__ == "1", "PC1 (-1 SD)",
ifelse(spa_dur_pc1_syllable_plot$data$cond__ == "2", "PC1 (mean)",
ifelse(spa_dur_pc1_syllable_plot$data$cond__ == "3", "PC1 (+1 SD)", 99)))

spa_dur_pc1_syllable_plot$data$cond__ <- factor(spa_dur_pc1_syllable_plot$data$cond__, levels = c("PC1 (-1 SD)", "PC1 (mean)", "PC1 (+1 SD)"))

spa_dur_pc1_syllable_plot
```
